execution_plan.description: Compute the number of products purchased per customer by counting order items associated with each order and grouping by customer_id.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.customer_id, COUNT(oi.order_item_id) AS products_bought FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY o.customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Get gender for the customers returned in step 1 (to allow aggregation of product counts by gender).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, gender_code FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
